front.title: Nonfinal Mobility Header for Mobile IPv6

abstract.t: This document specifies operations to allow inclusion of data alongwith a mobility header (from Mobile IPv6) containing a Binding Updateor Binding Acknowledgement message. In this way, smoother handoversand reduced jitter and bandwidth utilization can be achieved.Interactions with IPsec-based verification of mobility messages aredescribed; basically, establishment of such IPsec-based methodspreclude the use of the mobility header specified in this document,unless simple modifications to IPsec (outside the scope of thisdocument) can be utilized.
